name: Letters that do not form valid words should be rejected
scenarioId: game-rules:Letters that do not form valid words should be rejected
methodName: Letters that do not form valid words should be rejected

testSteps.description: 1: Letters that do not form valid words should be rejected ({Letter 1=T, Letter 2=O, Letter 3=, Letter 4=, Letter 5=, Reason=Word too short})

children.description:
Given the target word is:
| B | L | A | N | D |

When the player attempts to enter the following letters:
| T | O |  |  |  |
Then the attempt should be rejected

testSteps.description: 2: Letters that do not form valid words should be rejected ({Letter 1=A, Letter 2=B, Letter 3=C, Letter 4=D, Letter 5=E, Reason=Not a word})

children.description:
Given the target word is:
| B | L | A | N | D |

When the player attempts to enter the following letters:
| A | B | C | D | E |
Then the attempt should be rejected

testSteps.description: 3: Letters that do not form valid words should be rejected ({Letter 1=F, Letter 2=A, Letter 3=S, Letter 4=T, Letter 5=!, Reason=Not a word})

children.description:
Given the target word is:
| B | L | A | N | D |

When the player attempts to enter the following letters:
| F | A | S | T | ! |
Then the attempt should be rejected

userStory.narrative:
The rules of Wordle are simple. Your objective is to guess a secret five-letter word in as few guesses as possible.
  To submit a guess, type any five-letter word and press enter.
  All of your guesses must be real words, according to a dictionary of five-letter words that Wordle allows as guesses.

  Players have to guess a five-letter word.
  - Correctly placed letters are shown as GREEN
  - Incorrectly placed letters are shown as YELLOW
  - Letters not appearing in the word are represented as GRAY

title: Letters that do not form valid words should be rejected

rule.name: Incorrectly placed letters appear in yellow
